description:
Mireia Lalaguna Royo of Spain was crowned Miss World 2015 at the Beauty Crown Theater in Sanya, China. She is the first Spanish lass to win the blue crown and is now the successor of Rolene Strauss. 23-year old Miss Spain, Mireia Lalaguna is a student of Pharmacy, was crowned the best among 114 competitors.来自西班牙的米蕾亚·拉拉古娜·罗约在中国三亚的美冠剧院荣获2015年世界小姐冠军。她是西班牙第一位荣获蓝冠的佳丽，她会接替上一届冠军罗琳·施特劳斯。23岁的西班牙小姐米蕾亚·拉拉古娜是一名药学专业的学生。她从114位佳丽中脱颖而出，荣获冠军。

Sofia Nikitchuk of Russia placed 1st Runner-Up and Maria Harfanti of Indonesia was named 2nd Runner-Up. Synetta Myrie of Jamaica and Valerie Abou Chacra of Lebanon completed the Top 5.来自俄罗斯的佳丽索菲亚·尼基查克获得亚军，而来自印度尼西亚的玛利亚·哈法尔提获得季军。来自牙买加的佳丽赛妮塔·玛丽和来自黎巴嫩的瓦莱丽·阿布·查克拉争夺五强席位。

As for Miss Philippines Hillarie Parungao, she made it to Top 10 and was named winner of the Multimedia Challenge.而菲律宾小姐希拉里·帕润高挺进10强，并荣获“多媒体挑战者”大奖。

Yuan Lu won the Miss World China 2015 title. And she ranks 16th in the competition.而2015中国小姐袁璐在总决赛中排名16.
